description:
The Free Planets Alliance Navy Expeditionary Fleet encounters a grave shortage of food during its advance into Imperial territory. The 5th Fleet commander, Admiral Bewcock, conveys Yang`s proposed escape plan to Supreme Commander Lobos, but Lobos fails to comprehend the situation and won`t allow them to flee. Meanwhile, Reinhard has already given orders to Kircheis to strike the Alliance Navy`s supply convoy. The Imperial Navy`s counterattack has begun!
Source: crunchyroll
